entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
